your-pieces: Your pieces are shipped by 100% carbon offset shipping, with international tracking where available.
estimated-shipping: Estimated shipping times are as follows: <0/> Europe - 3 to 7 business days <0/> Rest of the World - 7 to 10 business days <0/> We ship within 3 days of placing order, with the exception of pre-ordered pieces, and you will receive email notification with your tracking number. <0/> Pre-order pieces are made within 1 to 2 weeks. Email us at <1>connect@mynalabel.com</1>.
customers-are-responsible: Customers are responsible for any customs and import taxes that may apply. MYNA is not responsible for delays due to customs.
if-you-are-unhappy: If you are unhappy with your order, please contact us at <0>connect@mynalabel.com</0> to let us know and we will assist you as well as we can.
if-you-are-otherwise: If you are otherwise unsatisfied with an item, it can be returned provided you contact us within 14 days of delivery and ship the item back within 21 days of delivery. <0/> Final sale orders are exempt and cannot be returned and refunded.
customers-responsible-return: Customers are responsible for return shipping costs and for the safe receipt by MYNA of any returned items.
returned-from-outside-eu: Where an item is being returned from outside the EU, please clearly mark the package as a return to ensure no customs costs are incurred. MYNA cannot be held responsible for customs costs relating to returned items.
incase-returned-not-arrived: In the case that a returned item is not received by MYNA in its original condition, the customer is responsible for any loss in value.
